title.rendered: Support Student Farmpreneurs at the Fall Giant Student Farmers Market, Oct. 16

content.rendered:
Clark County School District (CCSD) students at several schools will participate in the annual Giant Student Farmers Market with Green Our Planet on October 16, 2024, from 9:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at the Clark County Government Center, 500 South Grand Central Parkway. 

Student “Farmprenuers” will sell freshly grown produce and handcrafted goods for purchase. All profits will benefit school garden programs. In partnership with Green Our Planet, several CCSD schools provide students with STEM garden and hydroponics programs.
